Description:

Punchline: Don't fail at raid mechanics anymore

Author: The Combat Reborn Team
Name: A.ATK Rotation Solver Reborn
Description:
自动循环
Analyses combat information every frame and finds the best action.

This means almost all the information available in one frame in combat, including the status of all players in the party, the status of any hostile targets, skill cooldowns, the MP and HP of characters, the location of characters, casting status of the hostile target, combo, combat duration, player level, etc.
Then, it will highlight the best action on the hot bar, or help you to click on it.
It is designed for `general combat`, not for savage or ultimate. Use it carefully.
Punchline: Analyses combat information every frame and finds the best action.
Changelog:
## What's Changed
* Various fixes for PVP rotations, RDM, and swiftcast raise by @LTS-FFXIV in https://github.com/FFXIV-CombatReborn/RotationSolverReborn/pull/1109


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/FFXIV-CombatReborn/RotationSolverReborn/compare/7.4.0.8...7.4.0.9

Author: erdelf, Herculezz
Name: A.ATK AutoDuty CN
Description:
自动副本（汉化）
A plugin to run dungeons for you with Trust, Duty Support, Squadrons, Variants, and Regular, Requires BossMod, vnavmesh and a Rotation Plugin (BossMod AutoRotation, Wrath or RotationSolverReborn)

Author: Faye
Name: A.ATK BOCCHII
Punchline: BOCCHI is here to smooth out your Occult Crescent experience.
Description:
新月岛自动
BOCCHI is here to smooth out your Occult Crescent experience.
- No more of that pesky 'walking' or 'finding chests'. That's for losers.
- A cute little Fate and CE panel that'll tell you what rewards it gives AND help you automatically path to it, wowee.
- An extre illegal 'illegal mode' for those of you that would rather be touching grass or playing a game with worthwhile content.
